attributes.action: To Distance the UK from US Policies brought about by the Idiot Bush and his war mongering cronies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To Distance the UK from US foreign policies.  Why should the UK and British Citizens be put at risk because of US policies which in reality are only in the interests of US big business.

Don't be another Poodle for Bush.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
